channel.title: About Find on Find
channel.description: Recent content in About Find on Find

item.title: Usage
item.description:
Find takes an argument a filename expression and outputs a list of all files whose names match that expression below the current working directory.

For example:

$ go-find "*.go"

Will find all files with the extension .go.

Additional flags

Usage of go-find:
  -dir string
        Directory for search (default ".")
